info.name: Health
info.summary: App about your personal health. All medical data at one point. Use the advantages of a trusted plattform.
info.description:
This app holds and manage data about your personal medical health.
You can remember yourself for taking medicin or drink a glass water.
Combine different health data and find dependencies.
Track your weight or other things and export them for a doctor visit. Or just take a smooth view on your data.
Health is everything.
info.author: Florian Steffens
